modName: Dawnguard Heavy Plate - SkyRe compatibility patch
summary: Adds SkyRe crafting recipes for Baraban\\\'s Dawnguard Heavy Plate.
descriptionHtml:
Requires:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22602/
and
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286/


Installation:
-Must be using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286]Skyrim Redone[/url]
-Install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22602]Witcher 2 Style Dawnguard and Standard Heavy Plate[/url]
-Install my ESP
-Uncheck the original \"Baraban-Dawnguard-Plate_SkyRe.esp\"
-Make sure both \"SkyRe_Main.esp\" and my \"SkyRe_Plugin_Witcher 2 Style Dawnguard Armour.esp\" are loaded.

*Should still work perfectly fine with Baraban\'s Steel Plate replacer*

To install you MUST install Baraban\'s mod FIRST(before or after SkyRe doesnt matter), then install my ESP. [b][u]Do not load both my ESP and Baraban\'s original \"Baraban-Dawnguard-Plate_SkyRe.esp\" [/b][/u], just use mine as replacer/modified version.


I did not remove the items from Gunmars vendor list so you can still buy them normally, nor did I edit any of the stats. I added the recipes for crafting at the forge(theyre under Steel), meltdown recipes, and tempering recipes - all with the same requirements/stats as regular Steel Plate which is slightly better than the normal Dawnguard heavy set already. I DID add in some Vampire Dust as one of the crafting ingredients though, because I had a ton of it and I thought it made it more interesting :p


Credits:
Thanks to LordOfWar for taking the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5588]Witcher 2[/url] models to Skyrim, and LordBaraban for the epic [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22602]retexture[/url]. The vanilla Dawnguard heavy set was pretty lackluster so I when I saw this armour set I fell in love, and as a SkyRe user making it compatible was the next logical step.
author: Achromatis

files.name: Dawnguard Heavy Plate - SkyRe compatibility patch
